    AuthService -->> WebApp: Auth OK

    Trader ->> WebApp: Submit buy order
    WebApp ->> OrderEngine: Execute trade
    OrderEngine ->> WalletService: Deduct balance
    WalletService -->> OrderEngine: Balance updated

    OrderEngine ->> BlockchainNode: Broadcast transaction
    BlockchainNode -->> OrderEngine: Confirmed

    OrderEngine ->> NotificationCenter: Send update
    NotificationCenter -->> Trader: Purchase successful
